title: GDG DevFest The Baltics 2017
description: The biggest Google tech conference in the Baltics carefully crafted for you by GDG community! All about mobile development, Android and iOS, Mobile Crossplatform tools, UI/UX and prototyping, Internet of Things, VR and AR, bots, AI and more
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
motto: Be a GDG. Be a Hero!
subscribeNote: No spam, only the latest news and updates!
ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.
socialMotto: Like, follow or connect with us on
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: Riga Islande Hotel is a modern hotel, which can fulfill the needs of the large-scale event
aboutOrganizers: GDG Riga and GDG Daugavpils with support of GDGs from the Baltics are proud organizer of DevFest The Baltics
aboutGdg: Google Developers Group (GDG) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Riga](https://gdgriga.lv/) and [Google Developers Group (GDG) Daugavpils](https://daugavpils.gdg.lv) - are open and volunteer geek communities who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with the audience to boost development of IT.
